src:
Fake News Buster: She isn't a robot, but a video game character
06 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
THE CLAIM A video featuring a woman has been shared on social media with the claim that it is a robot in female form, unveiled in Japan a few days ago. SO, WHAT’S THE TRUTH? The female figure is actually a character from the video game Detroit: Become Human, which was launched for Playstation 4. The female is an android in the video game.
